TopicTitle: Professor Kerbenstein's wonderous vertical propulsion emporium.

Articles.Content:
Make the stuff that is here ready for release, so we, your fans, can play around with what you have now!

Then you can use all the time you want to make bigger and better stuff!

I am, I just keep sneaking off to fly/crash rockets etc
After the release make station parts. Please. I lobe stations.

My brain hurts so much from the learning curve over the last week. I started off with a steampunk idea, and managed to drift wildly...

Beautiful textures man

why is it so hard to get docking ports to work... but I did it... HUZZAH!!!

I hope it stays working....
getting close now... sorry if im dragging it out, its just so tedious fixing minor bugs

Take your time, I can't wait to try it out!

Heh, I wonder how FAR will handle it all
I might need to rethink my texturing approach, unless i can get KSP to share texture files, my mod pack is kinda chubby at the moment (44 parts unzipped is around 189Mb, zips to 60Mb)

I might need to rethink my texturing approach, unless i can get KSP to share texture files, my mod pack is kinda chubby at the moment (44 parts unzipped is around 189Mb, zips to 60Mb)

That is a bit too much for me. How the hell? Really! KSO has 200! KWRcoketry has 200! I think you have less parts than them.
Yersh, need some skinny-ing down i think, will have to experiment with sharing textures or make em smaller... dang....

The release is getting 2close4comfort.

I'm just squeedling in my mind about this.
well i can squeeze my 3Mb .mbm files down to 300kb .png files @ 512x512.... its a sad day for texture resolution

well i can squeeze my 3Mb .mbm files down to 300kb .png files @ 512x512.... its a sad day for texture resolution

Why don't you set up a cfg for the texture-reducer?

Why don't you set up a cfg for the texture-reducer?

I will look into it now, thanks

Umm... i think it's why it's said in modding tutorials to always make textures for KSP in .png.

Yes i can feel it. I feel it on my body and my sould and brain. It's coming! Teh epic reelease ist coming!

Most of my models share a common texture file, with different textures inside, I wonder if I should make individual textures for each part...

...gawd that would take forever, and require artistic skills!!!... which I dont have

I will resize shared textures for alpha, and see if I get yelled at much, then i can make MOAR PARTS!!!!!!

Of coarse this means a few more days delay while i re-export everything from unity, so tedious.

need inspiration fast!!!

Most of my models share a common texture file, with different textures inside, I wonder if I should make individual textures for each part...

...gawd that would take forever, and require artistic skills!!!... which I dont have

I will resize shared textures for alpha, and see if I get yelled at much, then i can make MOAR PARTS!!!!!!

You... don't have artistic skills? I'm having a hard time believing that

You... don't have artistic skills? I'm having a hard time believing that

No Sir!, here at Professor Phineous Kerbenstein's Wonderous Vertical Propulsion Emporium I am the Cheif second in command junior vice janitor's helper!!!!

and so art is not really my department...

... however if you take a tour of the restroom, you can see some fine examples of my illustration and poetry!
Postcard from the Mun
Resize is now 20ish Mb, I am nearly there sorry for the delay

Postcard from the Mun

http://i.imgur.com/vaoBOiz.jpg

"No crackers Jeb! We've forgotten the crackers!"

ok, so now i am allmost done, and surprisingly nervous

I will be moving to release thread very soon, gotta work out license etc.....
Hmm... now i wonder how coal burns in space... and how water boils... i mean how does it look?

Looks pretty cool. But don't you think wood can burn in Atmosphere at high speed, Re-entry or a smallsmoke on the ship[overheating(start)] or the ship over the Sun, on Moho and can't go too far because the wood will crack. In reality it will crack at extremely low temperatures and burn when it reaches 60-100 Celsius degrees?But i forgot something... the iron will melt at 1000*C.

Edit: It gave me an idea! Lava cannon!Or fire...

But i like the mod
